snippet: Eight of the states with the highest levels of gun violence were among the 25 states with the weakest gun laws, a report by the Center for American Progress found.
abstract: Center for American Progress will release report linking high rates of gun violence to weak state regulation; report finds that eight states with high levels of gun violence are among 25 with weakest gun laws.
lead_paragraph: Eight of the states with the highest levels of gun violence were among the 25 states with the weakest gun laws, a report by the Center for American Progress found.

headline.seo: Report Links High Rates of Gun Violence to Weak Laws
headline.main: Report Links High Rates of Gun Violence to Weak State Regulations
headline.print_headline: Report Links High Rates of Gun Violence to Weak State Regulations
